did.unittitle: James Ojalvo Collection of Seattle Minimum Wage Campaign Memorabilia

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: James Ojalvo is an Engineering student at Cornell University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: 15now.org is the website address for the campaign across the country to raise the minimum wage to $15/hour. 15 Now is part of the bigger movement open to everyone that wants to join and fight to raise minimum wages.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Ojalvo Collection of Seattle Minimum Wage Campaign Memorabilia #6383 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: buttons - $15/hr. and a UNION wwwVoteSawant.org ; TAX THE RICH! Www.votesawant.org -- broadsides -- March for $15 ; I [heart] work place theft ; The owner of the space needle can't help fix wealth inequality in Seattle. ; Help us win $15/hr.!
